import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import BeatList from "../components/BeatList"; import {apiGetBeats, apiRequests} from "../backendQuery"; import Navigation from "../components/Navigation" import {InputGroup, FormControl, Button, Table, Form, Card, Container, Row, Col, ButtonGroup,CardDeck,Carousel} from "react-bootstrap" import Player from "../components/AudioPlayer"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; const IndexPage = () => { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { setIndex(selectedIndex); } const [beat, setBeat] = useState("") const [showPlayer, setShowPlayer] = useState(false) const handleReq = (data) =>{ console.log(data) } const selectedBeat =(beat)=>{ setBeat(beat); setShowPlayer(true); } return ( <>

); } export default IndexPage;
